title: Ant regenerate fails to be no-op on 5.x
description: When running "ant regenerate" in analysis/common, it creates java files that do not even compile.

comments.author: Uwe Schindler
comments.content: This was already fixed by LUCENE-6740, but I open issue to track the change.
